name: Suberra
highlight: Payments Infrastructure that allows projects and businesses to accept cryptocurrency payments for anything from one-time payments to subscriptions.
summary: Suberra is a Web 3.0 payments platform that allows businesses to accept crypto payments from anywhere for anything. It provides the fastest and easiest way to offer recurring or one-time crypto payments. It allows crypto pull-based payments, making payment experience from crypto wallets into one that is similar to credit cards. It is also a multi-chain platform with support for over 100 wallets and gasless USDC transactions to provide a frictionless user experience.
